name: JawBreaker (itch) (ExtraBilly)
description:
Use Arrow keys to move.

Use Space Bar to eat.

The game is over when you don't have any more teeth.

You are scored based on how much candy you eat and how fast you destroy your teeth.

Pink candy is worth more points.

You get a "CRUNCH" that doubles your points when you have more than one piece of candy in your mouth at once.

Game Design and Direction by Billy Burton

Jawbreaker Theme music by Ruthie Kovanen
